content: To start the embedding process, add the {{productName}} URL to the allow list.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message instructing users to add the product URL to the allow list to start the embedding process. It appears in a dialog or settings page, specifically in a category header, and provides context for translators familiar with content security policies (CSP).

usage.context:
<>
 <CategoryHeader>
 {t("CSPHeader", { productName: t("Common:ProductName") })}
 </CategoryHeader>
 <Container className="description-holder">
 {t("CSPDescription", { productName: t("Common:ProductName") })}
 <HelpButton
 className="csp-helpbutton"
 offsetRight={0}
 size={12}
 tooltipContent={<Text fontSize="12px">{t("CSPHelp")}</Text>}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "لتضمين {{productName}} بشكل آمن كإطار iframe في موقع ويب، قم بإضافة عنوان URL الخاص به إلى قائمة السماح لديك" is overly technical. While technically correct, it includes jargon ('iframe') that's unnecessary for the target audience and less user-friendly. The original English emphasizes *starting* the embedding process. The current translation focuses on safe embedding, which isn't the primary message.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: لتفعيل عملية تضمين {{productName}}، أضف عنوان URL الخاص به إلى قائمة السماح.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation includes the phrase 'قائمة السماح لديك' which is redundant. 'قائمة السماح' is sufficient.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: لتفعيل عملية تضمين {{productName}}، أضف عنوان URL الخاص به إلى قائمة السماح.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'təhlükəsiz şəkildə yerləşdirmək' (in a risky way) doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'to start the embedding process'. The English phrase implies initiation, not a risk assessment.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more neutral phrasing like 'təhlükəsizliyi təmin etmək üçün' (to ensure security) or 'daxil etmək üçün' (to embed).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'icazələr siyahısına əlavə edin' literally translates to 'add to the permissions list.' While understandable, it is not the most natural phrasing. A more common term for 'allow list' in this context might be preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'tətbiqət siyahısına əlavə edin' (add to the application list) or 'məqbul siyahıya əlavə edin' (add to the approved list).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is overly literal and doesn't fully convey the intended meaning of "allow list". While technically correct, it sounds clunky and less user-friendly. The phrase "като iframe в уебсайт" is also a bit too technical for a general user.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: За да включите {{productName}} в уебсайта си, добавете URL адреса му към списъка с разрешени сайтове.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of "URL адреса му" is grammatically correct but could be slightly improved for flow and readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL адреса на {{productName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Czech translation, "Chcete-li bezpečně vložit {{productName}} jako iframe do webové stránky, přidejte její adresu URL do seznamu povolených adres," implies embedding via iframe. The English source text does not specify an iframe. The translation adds implied functionality.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Chcete-li zahájit proces vkládání, přidejte URL {{productName}} do seznamu povolených adres.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation's phrasing "Um {{productName}} sicher als iFrame in eine Website einzubetten" deviates from the original's instruction to 'start the embedding process.' While technically correct, it's more verbose and less direct. The emphasis shifts from initiation to security.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Um den Einbettungsprozess zu starten, fügen Sie die {{productName}} URL zu Ihrer Zulassungsliste hinzu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the phrase 'Ihre Zulassungsliste' feels slightly formal. A less formal alternative might improve readability, depending on the target audience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ihre Liste der erlaubten URLs

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation focuses on embedding as an iframe, while the English content is more general about starting the embedding process. The Greek translation introduces a specific method (iframe) not explicitly mentioned in the original.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Για να ξεκινήσετε τη διαδικασία ενσωμάτωσης, προσθέστε τη διεύθυνση URL του {{productName}} στη λίστα αδειών σας.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Para incrustar {{productName}} de forma segura como iframe en un sitio web, añada su URL a la lista de direcciones permitidas." implies embedding via iframe and explicitly mentions 'securely'. The original English text is more general and doesn't specify the embedding method or security.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Para iniciar el proceso de incrustación, añada la URL de {{productName}} a la lista de direcciones permitidas.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon after '{{productName}}' feels slightly unnatural in Finnish. While grammatically correct, it can be improved for flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Lisää {{productName}} URL:n luotettujen listalle aloittaaksesi upotusprosessin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Pour intégrer {{productName}} en toute sécurité sous la forme de cadre intégré dans un site web, ajoutez son URL à votre liste d'autorisations." is overly verbose and doesn't accurately reflect the simplicity of the English original. The phrase "sous la forme de cadre intégré" is unnecessary and technically inaccurate (it doesn't necessarily involve an iframe).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pour démarrer le processus d'intégration, ajoutez l'URL de {{productName}} à votre liste d'autorisations.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The addition of 'en toute sécurité' ('securely') doesn't align with the original meaning. The original focuses on enabling the embedding process, not necessarily emphasizing security.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove 'en toute sécurité'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation emphasizes embedding via iframe, which isn't explicitly stated in the English content. The English implies adding the URL to an allowlist for general access, not solely for iframe embedding. 'անվտանգ ներկառուցելու համար' (safely embed) is too specific.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more general translation that reflects adding the URL to an allowlist for access, such as: "{{productName}}-ը թույլատրվելու ցուցակում գրանցեք, որպեսզի այն աշխատի:". This implies functionality rather than specific embedding method.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon (:) at the end of the Armenian sentence feels abrupt. It might be more natural to soften the ending.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace the colon with a period or a more nuanced phrasing to avoid a harsh ending. For example: '... ձեր թույլտվությունների ցանկում։' or '... ձեր թույլտվությունների ցանկում' .

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Italian translation implies embedding via iframe, which might not be the intended method. The original English text simply refers to adding the URL to an allow list, which is a more general concept.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more general translation that doesn't specify iframe, such as: 'Per consentire l'accesso a {{productName}}, aggiungi il suo URL all'elenco consentiti.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'incorporare' is technically correct, but can sound overly formal or technical in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'aggiungere' or 'includere' as a more natural alternative to 'incorporare'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'To start the embedding process' is not accurately conveyed by the Japanese translation 'iframeとして安全にウェブサイトに埋め込むには'.  The English implies an initial step, while the Japanese directly describes a method of embedding. A more accurate translation for 'To start the embedding process' might be something like '埋め込みを開始するには' or '埋め込みの手順を開始するには'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 埋め込みを開始するには、{{productName}}のURLを許可リストに追加してください。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'add the {{productName}} URL to the allow list' is not as concise in Japanese. While technically correct, it's a bit verbose.  The current translation '{{productName}}のURLを許可リストに追加してください' is acceptable, but could be improved for a smoother read.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: {{productName}}のURLを許可リストに登録してください。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation implies embedding the URL within an iframe, which isn't necessarily what the original text means. The original text simply refers to adding the URL to an allow list for embedding purposes.  The Korean translation is overly specific.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 웹사이트에 {{productName}}를 임베드하려면 해당 URL을 허용 목록에 추가하세요.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Lai tīmekļa vietnē {{productName}} droši iegultu kā iframe" is not the most natural way to express "To start the embedding process..." in Latvian. While technically correct, it’s overly literal and complex. A simpler phrasing would be better for clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Lai sāktu ieguldēšanas procesu, pievienojiet {{productName}} URL savam atļauju sarakstam.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "vietrādi URL" is not a standard term and is likely a mistranslation of 'URL'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Om {{productName}} veilig in te sluiten als een iframe in een website, voegt u de URL toe aan uw toestaan-lijst' is not a direct or accurate translation of 'To start the embedding process, add the {{productName}} URL to the allow list.' The Dutch translation implies embedding as an iframe which is not explicitly stated in the English content. A more literal translation would be better.  The word 'veilig' (safely) is also not present in the English original.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Om de inbeddingsprocedure te starten, voegt u de {{productName}} URL toe aan uw toestaanlijst.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation adds "Aby bezpiecznie osadzić {{productName}} jako element iframe na swojej stronie internetowej," which isn't directly present in the English source. While embedding via iframe might be implied, it's an addition that changes the meaning slightly. The core message of adding the URL to the allow list isn't emphasized as strongly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Aby rozpocząć proces osadzania, dodaj adres URL {{productName}} do swojej listy dozwolonych.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Polish translation uses a slightly more formal tone than the English. While not strictly incorrect, it could be adjusted to match the original's brevity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more conversational tone, though this is a minor point.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "incorporar com segurança o {{productName}} como um iframe num Website" is a more technical explanation than the original English. The original simply states to add the URL to an allow list.  A better translation would convey the essence of adding the URL to a list for access, without explicitly mentioning iframe or security.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Para iniciar o processo de incorporação, adicione o URL do {{productName}} à sua lista de permissões.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Para incorporar com segurança o {{productName}} como um iframe em um site, adicione seu URL à sua lista de permissões" implies embedding via iframe. The original English text refers to adding the URL to an allow list to *start* the embedding process, which is broader than just iframe embedding. The translation is too specific.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Para iniciar o processo de incorporação, adicione o URL do {{productName}} à sua lista de permissões.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ao seu URL' is a bit awkward. It could be improved for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ao URL do {{productName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Pentru a încorpora spațiul {{productName}} bazat pe iFrame într-o pagina web' is not a direct or accurate translation of 'To start the embedding process...'.  It introduces the concept of 'iFrame' and 'pagina web' without it being directly implied in the English content. A more accurate translation should focus on the embedding action.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pentru a începe procesul de integrare, adăugați adresa URL a {{productName}} la lista de permisiuni.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'într-o' can be improved for better flow. While grammatically correct, it could be more natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pentru a începe procesul de integrare, adăugați adresa URL a {{productName}} la lista de permisiuni.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation introduces the concept of embedding as an iframe, which isn't explicitly mentioned in the English content. The English implies adding the URL to a list to initiate the embedding process, not specifying how it's embedded.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Чтобы начать процесс интеграции {{productName}}, добавьте его URL-адрес в список разрешенных.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'в качестве iframe' is unnecessary and changes the meaning. It's better to keep the phrasing more general.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove 'в качестве iframe'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "add the {{productName}} URL to the allow list" is not entirely accurate. 'ඒ.ස.නි.' seems to be an abbreviation for 'URL' but is not commonly used in this context and may be confusing to Sinhala speakers.  A more natural translation would avoid the abbreviation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: කාවැද්දීමේ ක්‍රියාවලිය ඇරඹීමට, ඉඩ දෙන ලැයිස්තුවට {{productName}} වෙබ් අඩවිය එක් කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically not incorrect, using the Sinhala abbreviation for URL, 'ඒ.ස.නි.', might disrupt the flow and readability for some users. It's more standard to use the English term or a Sinhala alternative.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a more common term or phrasing for 'URL' in Sinhala.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Pokiaľ chcete bezpečne umiestniť {{productName}} na webovú stránku ako iframe" implies the content is to be embedded as an iframe. The original English text refers to adding the URL to an allow list for embedding, which is a more general process. While iframe embedding is a *possible* use case, the Slovak translation is too specific.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pokiaľ chcete začať s procesom vloženia {{productName}}, pridajte jeho URL do zoznamu povolených adries.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovak translation uses "zoznamu povolených adries" which is a bit literal and could be more natural.  Consider a more idiomatic Slovak expression.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pokiaľ chcete začať s procesom vloženia {{productName}}, pridajte jeho URL do zoznamu povolených.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Če želite varno vdelati {{productName}} kot iframe na spletno mesto, dodajte njegov URL na seznam dovoljenih." is not a direct or natural translation of "To start the embedding process, add the {{productName}} URL to the allow list." While technically correct, the phrase 'varno vdelati... kot iframe na spletno mesto' implies specifically embedding as an iframe which isn't necessarily stated in the English original. A more accurate translation focusing on the process of adding to the allow list would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Če želite začeti postopek vdelave, dodajte URL {{productName}} na seznam dovoljenih.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'to embed {{productName}} as an iframe on a website securely' is overly literal and doesn't quite capture the simplicity of the English sentence. The English sentence focuses on adding the URL to an allow list to *start* the embedding process, while the Turkish translation implies a complete embedding action. The nuance of 'to start' is lost.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: '{{productName}}'i bir web sitesine gömmek için URL'yi izin verilenler listenize ekleyin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the phrase 'URL bağlantısını' is somewhat redundant. 'URL' itself implies a connection or link.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 'URL'yi izin verilenler listenize ekleyin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses 'Щоб безпечно впровадити {{productName}} на вебсайті як вбудований фрейм'. A more accurate translation would be something along the lines of 'To embed {{productName}}, add its URL to the allow list'. The current translation is overly verbose and introduces technical terms that may not be necessary for the user.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Щоб вбудувати {{productName}}, додайте його URL-адресу до списку дозволених.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrasing 'URL-адресу' is a bit clunky. While grammatically correct, it could be slightly more natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL до списку дозволених

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Để nhúng {{productName}} một cách an toàn dưới dạng iframe trong một trang web' is too verbose and doesn't accurately reflect the simplicity of the English sentence.  'Một cách an toàn dưới dạng iframe trong một trang web' adds unnecessary detail.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Để bắt đầu quá trình nhúng, hãy thêm URL của {{productName}} vào danh sách cho phép.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'dưới dạng' isn't the most natural phrasing in this context. It's more formal than necessary.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider removing 'dưới dạng' entirely for a more conversational tone.
